Actions.Name: Build Barricade
Actions.Description: The Tollkin creates a line 4 terrain effect. The effect is difficult terrain and foes that cross it must save or become winded.

Actions.Name: Golden Knuckles
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 2 for every valuables token the Tollkin is holding.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes 3 damage, once for every valuables token the Tollkin is holding.
